J. B. Rainsberger wrote:

> Get a copy of Dave Astels, "Test-Driven Development: A Practical
> Guide". It's the best description of testing a Swing UI with JUnit I
> have ever seen.

Well, I have to say that after skimming it for the first time, I am a
little bit disappointed; especially about the chapter on testing GUIs.

Cheers, Ilja
